short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an odometer filter for vehicles to Facebook marketplace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides a popup that allows you to filter vehicle listings on Facebook Marketplace by their odometer value. 
Enter your own minimum or maximum values, or select from the dropdowns, then click "filter".

The values apply regardless of locale/unit - if you filter to 200,000, this excludes anything over that many kilometres OR miles.

If you prefer not to download an extension (although it is easier), you can filter results for searches by adding the following to the end of the search URL:
&maxMileage=150000
(and/or)
&minMileage=150000
where 150000 can be any number, and the filter also applies regardless of unit.
